title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that the user can log in successfully using valid credentials and receive a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click on the login button.
Check that login is successful and a JWT token is received.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when the user enters incorrect username or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email and/or password.
Click on the login button.
Check that login fails with appropriate error message.

title: JWT Token Validation and Device Approval
description: Verify that after login, the JWT token is valid and the device approval process is enforced correctly.

steps.description: Log in successfully with valid credentials.
Verify JWT token signature and expiration.
Check if new device requires approval before granting access.

title: Dashboard Loads Real-Time Metrics Correctly
description: Verify that the dashboard loads with real-time statistics, metrics, and charts for properties, HR, CRM, and finance modules.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user with dashboard access.
Navigate to the main dashboard page.
Verify that all real-time metrics and charts are displayed correctly.
Check that data is consistent with backend API responses.

title: CRUD Operations in Property Management
description: Verify create, read, update, and delete operations for properties, units, blocks, floors, and leases with correct data linkage and code generation.

steps.description: Create a new property with all required fields.
Verify the property is listed correctly in the properties view.
Add units, blocks, and floors related to the property.
Verify the hierarchical data structure and correct code generation for units.
Create a lease associated with a unit.
Check that lease status updates and data are correct.
Update and delete property and related entities.
Ensure data integrity is maintained after updates and deletions.

title: Tenant Portal Access and Payment Workflow
description: Verify tenants can log in to the portal, view their dashboard, invoices, ledger, and successfully submit payments and maintenance requests.

steps.description: Log in as a tenant via tenant portal.
Check tenant dashboard displays accurate information.
View and verify invoices and ledger entries.
Make a payment using supported payment methods.
Verify payment is recorded and reflected in tenant ledger.
Submit a maintenance request through the portal.
Verify maintenance request is logged and status updates are visible.

title: Financial Transactions and Accounting Rules Enforcement
description: Validate that financial transactions, invoices, payments, and commissions adhere to accounting rules including debit-credit balance, tax calculation, and payment allocation.

steps.description: Create a financial transaction with debit and credit entries.
Verify the transaction maintains balanced debits and credits.
Generate an invoice with applicable taxes.
Check that tax amounts are correctly calculated and displayed.
Make payments against the invoice partially and fully.
Verify payments are allocated correctly and invoice status updates.
Calculate and apply commissions as per defined rules.
Ensure commission calculations are accurate.

title: CRM Leads and Deals Pipeline Management
description: Verify that CRM users can create, update, and track leads, convert leads to clients, manage deals, and communications with correct stage updates and permission enforcement.

steps.description: Create new lead with required details.
Verify lead appears correctly in leads view.
Update lead status and convert lead to client.
Check that client record is created and lead is removed or updated appropriately.
Create and update deals linked to clients with pipeline stage changes.
Verify pipeline stages reflect the correct status and data consistency.
Add communications related to leads or deals.
Verify communications are tracked and visible with correct permissions.

title: HR Employee Records and Attendance Tracking
description: Verify HR module supports CRUD operations for employee records, real-time attendance tracking, leave management, and payroll calculation accuracy.

steps.description: Add a new employee with all required details.
Employee appears correctly in employees view.
Record employee attendance through real-time portal.
Verify attendance records update accurately and reflect in reports.
Apply for leave and approve or reject leave requests.
Check leave balances and approvals are updated correctly.
Process payroll for employees based on attendance and leaves.
Verify payroll calculations comply with specified rules and are accurate.

title: AI Intelligence Data Analysis and Recommendations
description: Verify AI intelligence module generates credible forecasts and actionable recommendations based on available system data.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Intelligence page.
Request forecast or recommendation reports.
Verify outputs are generated and data is consistent with system inputs.
Check recommendations are reasonable and actionable.

title: Notification Delivery and Read Status
description: Validate that notifications are delivered in real-time to users with correct unread counts and read status updates.

steps.description: Trigger system events that generate notifications (e.g. lease expiry, payment due).
Verify notifications appear promptly in user notification list.
Mark notifications as read.
Check that unread counts decrement accordingly and read status persists after refresh.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users' access rights are restricted according to their roles and permissions, preventing unauthorized data access or actions.

steps.description: Log in as a user with limited permissions.
Attempt to access restricted modules or perform unauthorized CRUD operations.
Verify access is denied and proper error messages or redirections occur.
Log in as an admin user.
Verify full access to all authorized modules and management features.

title: API Endpoint Response and Error Handling
description: Verify that all REST API endpoints respond with correct data formats, handle errors gracefully, and validate inputs properly.

steps.description: Send valid requests to all major API endpoints.
Verify responses have correct data and status codes.
Send invalid or malformed requests with missing or incorrect parameters.
Check that proper validation errors are returned with meaningful messages.
Send unauthorized requests without valid JWT tokens.
Verify access is denied with appropriate status codes (e.g., 401 Unauthorized).

title: Support Ticket Creation and Resolution Workflow
description: Validate the support system allowing users to create tickets, support staff to resolve them, and audit logs track all activities.

steps.description: Create a new support ticket with complete details.
Ticket appears in the support ticket list and is visible to support staff.
Update ticket status to 'In Progress' and add resolution comments.
Verify ticket status updates and comments are recorded correctly.
Close the support ticket.
Check audit logs reflect the full ticket lifecycle accurately.

title: File Upload and Validation
description: Ensure files and images can be uploaded successfully with validation on file types and sizes, and errors handled properly.

steps.description: Attempt to upload supported file types within size limits.
Verify files upload successfully and are accessible.
Attempt to upload unsupported file types or files exceeding size limits.
Check that errors are displayed and upload is rejected.

title: System Performance Under Load
description: Validate system response times and scalability targets under realistic user workloads and data volumes.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent users performing key operations (e.g., login, property management updates, tenant portal access).
Measure response times and verify they meet defined performance criteria.
Scale data volume to large datasets (thousands of properties, tenants, transactions).
Verify system maintains responsiveness and correctness of data retrieval and updates.
